The researcher is the mountains, such as the curse, like the wool, without the supplies, redness, or the dyeing, the colors of sayings and the choice of the collection of the last, and that to the conflict of the colors of the mountains, and from it Black, if it is smooth and flormed in the atmosphere, it is likened, that is, the scratch, as in the Quarter, if the wind folds it, and from the good, the mountains are walking with the wind, then Like the curse, then it is sorry, and it will be wrapped.
